skills.name: Scepter of Authority
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-target nuke with 4x ATK multiplier. Damage +10% total when fully booked.
35% chance (50% fully booked) to place 50% Decrease ATK for 2 turns. Chance increases +5% at books 4, 5, 6.

skills.book_value: Low-medium priority - Damage +10%, Decrease ATK +15% (35%→50%). Not critical compared to A2/A3 cooldowns.
skills.notes: Basic A1 with defensive utility. Decrease ATK helps team survivability. Low priority for booking compared to A2/A3.

skills.name: Necro Mutation (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Heals all allies by 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP. After healing, places a [Perfect Veil] buff for 2 turns on all allies with full HP. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 1 turn instead on all allies with less than 100% HP.
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
